Info.description:
Software to show and reconstruct scattering patterns from Helium droplets and embedded dopants for: Facility: European XFEL GmbH, Holzkoppel 4, 22869 Schenefeld Proposal: #2195 - June 2019 Beamline: SASE3 Instrument: SQS (Small Quantum Systems) End Station: NQS (Nano-sized Quantum Systems)
Data taken by big collaboration which will soon be listed here. Big THANK YOU to everyone who participated.
Software written by: Anatoli Ulmer anatoli.ulmer@gmail.com 2020
